channel.title: Help me plz 508 help plz plz!
channel.description: Whenever i download a source or client for a 508 or 377 sometimes it has run but most of time it doesnt. If it has it doesnt work. Ive been told to copy a run from a diff server into one to give it a run... it then shows up for less than a second and disappears. Ive been told to get a better version of java also. I have jdk 6.12 so which of these ways works and what am i doing wrong? I dont use 508s much so plz help!

Whenever i download a source or client for a 508 or 377 sometimes it has run but most of time it doesnt. If it has it doesnt work. Ive been told to copy a run from a diff server into one to give it a run… it then shows up for less than a second and disappears. Ive been told to get a better version of java also. I have jdk 6.12 so which of these ways works and what am i doing wrong? I dont use 508s much so plz help!

Make sure you have set your environment variables correctly.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 27, 2009, 02:35:30 pm[/size][hr]AND DONT DOUBLE POST!
